left_text: Metasomal pale hair bands of T2 to T4, except laterally on basal terga, immediately behind graduli, not on posterior marginal zones of terga; mandible of male threetoothed (Africa to southern India and the Philippines)
right_text: Metasomal pale hair bands on posterior marginal zones of terga; mandible of male two-toothed

left_text: Body heriadiform, 6-8 mm long; omaular carina distinct; female clypeus with longitudinal median carina; tibial spurs strongly hooked; labrum of female without well-formed fringe (Africa)
right_text: Body robust hoplitiform, 8.0-10.5 mm long; omaular carina absent; female without clypeal carina; tibial spurs weakly curved at apices; labrum of female with distinct fringe (southern Africa and Israel)
